name: Classical-42
description: SUROS invites you to bring back the classics.

name: Countess SA/2
description: A noble commander of the battlefield.

name: The Long Goodbye
description: "Yeah… I lost a lot of these out on Nessus. Long story. Lots of dead Vex." —The Drifter

name: Apostate
description: "Survival is our most holy writ. Heterodoxy will be its own undoing." —Kuldax

name: Wicked Sister
description: The bad influence in the family.

name: Service Revolver
description: To Serve and Protect.

name: Bellowing Giant
description: Fate will hear your war cry.

name: Lonesome
description: Am I the only one who sees?

name: Telesto
description: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

name: Zealot's Reward
description: "Why not use these gifts we've been given?" —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

name: Parcel of Stardust
description: Everybody's looking for theirs.

name: The Steady Hand
description: Forged in honor of Perun, and a just and unwavering resolve.

name: IKELOS_SMG_v1.0.2
description:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: Deathbringer
description: "Sing them a lullaby of death and nothing more."

name: Perfect Paradox
description:
A tale that's different from the rest: the thread unfurls against the clocks.
The one the Speaker loved the best must have a perfect paradox.

name: Interference VI
description: Come between your enemies and their lives.

name: Honor's Edge
description: "Good leadership requires discernment: the art of finely dividing one subtle thing from another." —Executor Hideo

name: Does Not Compute
description: The engineers aren't ready for us.

name: The Huckleberry
description: Nothin' in the world that 30 rounds can't solve.

name: Persuader
description: "They say you can't reason with these enemies. I dunno—my gun and I seem to manage just fine." —Kei-Ying

name: Belfry Bounty
description: "Making guns helps the hours pass. Especially since Suraya never calls…" —Devrim Kay

name: Maestro-46
description: SUROS invites you to lead.

name: Imperative
description: "We must stop the weavers before they seal the Garden and begin to summon back its heart." —Ikora Rey

name: Gunnora's Axe
description: "She taught us all to appreciate a good, sturdy axe." —Lord Saladin

name: Calusea Noblesse
description: "A Reefborn long rifle, rewritten with Hive voices to arm Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus

name: Witherhoard
description: "Like a one-man private security company." —The Drifter

name: Drang
description: Since the Collapse, these pistols have been retooled several times to boost their firepower. A worn inscription reads, "To Victor, from Sigrun."

name: Rat King
description: We are small, but we are legion.

name: Anarchy
description: "Stick to wall, ground, human… then FFFFFRRRRRYYYYY! Hehehehehehehe." —Siviks, Lost to None

name: The Scholar (Adept)
description: You can't pull an all-nighter when the sun never sets.

name: Erentil FR4
description: Bring on the sunrise.

name: Eyes of Tomorrow
description: "I want to see it all, unhindered, and know it's mine to take." —Clovis Bray

name: Sacred Provenance
description: "These gifts were not made for us, but we were meant to have them." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

name: New City
description: "That's what I see when I look at the Farm." —Devrim Kay

name: Atalanta-D
description: They will tell you that you can't. Don't listen to them.

name: Bastion
description: "The final stand is wherever I plant my feet. Not one step more." —Saint-14

name: Atalanta-D XG1992
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: Rose
description: In his strong hand the man held a Rose. And his aura burned bright.

name: Austringer
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: The Quickstep
description: SUROS invites you pick up the pace.

name: Blast Battue
description: "Yes, you got the kill, but the pelt is ruined." —Devrim Kay

name: Quitclaim Shotgun III
description: Ownership rules.

name: The Scholar
description: You can't pull an all-nighter when the sun never sets.

name: Cartesian Coordinate
description: Where does one end and the other begin?

name: Shock and Awe
description: Do not fear. Be what others fear.

name: Nox Echo III
description: Listen, and you will hear it.

name: Tarantula
description: No one will escape my web.

name: Ghost Primus
description: The Ghost Primus was strong because of his disfigurement, not in spite of it. He alone had the vision to share my dream of a new, perfect world. Ghaul was a creature of singular beauty, and I loved him.

name: Purpose
description: "You have not yet found your purpose. But it has found you." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Death Adder
description: You will not see me coming.

name: The Mornin' Comes
description: Fix your eye upon the rising sun.

name: Scipio-D
description: Battle for annihilation.

name: Apex Predator
description: Is it you or I that tops the food chain, o challenger mine?

name: Antiope-D
description: They look to you to save them.

name: Kindled Orchid
description: Find the beauty in the flame.

name: Enigma's Draw
description: "Indeed, I traffic in all kinds of secrets and mysteries. Weapons, as well." —Lakshmi-2

name: Seventh Seraph SAW
description: Chained away long ago; its jaws too eager in times of peace.

name: Leviathan's Breath
description: "Cast a Shadow over the wilds of this universe. Return with glorious trophies." —Emperor Calus

name: Cloudstrike
description: They return to moons devoid. Their eyes searching. It's just begun. Meet this storm of sound and fury, till thunder-clashes fade to silence.

name: Imminent Storm
description: It's going to get worse before it gets better.

name: Play of the Game
description: Show no mercy.

name: Haunted Earth
description: "Those we've lost still linger in every place we look. Earth is no place for the living." —Arach Jalaal

name: Contingency Plan
description: "The Traveler is an illusion. A false god. It will not save us. But this might." —Arach Jalaal

name: Pillager
description: "No mercy out here. Can't afford it." —The Drifter

name: Gentleman Vagabond
description: Everyone loves a scoundrel.

name: Subjunctive
description: Stop 'em? Pretty sure our deaths are just meant to be the early warning system.

name: Trackless Waste
description: "No footprints out here." —Olu Alderdice

name: Traitor's Fate
description: Let the Emperor's gratitude end your foes as swiftly as you have ended his.

name: Older Sister III
description: "To protect us, as she once protected me." —Executor Hideo

name: Two-Tailed Fox
description: Adorably murderous.

name: Komodo-4FR
description: I await the perfect moment and watch my enemies decay.

name: Foggy Notion
description: "Hard to make it out, just a blur of bullets and fists."

name: Out of Options
description: "All you really need is two."

name: Red Mamba
description: My venom is swift.

name: Somerled-D
description: Heroes are not born, but made.

name: Zenith of Your Kind
description: "Earth has no Shadow. Not yet." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

name: Bygones
description: "Gone, but never forgotten." —The Drifter

name: Corsair's Wrath
description: "We are only briefly Awoken. The rest of existence is an eternal dream." —Sedia

name: Tyranny of Heaven
description: It was She that inspired me to imagine your destruction, o jailer mine.

name: Patron of Lost Causes
description: There is a rough engraving on its side: "In Memoriam."

name: Arc Logic
description: "The Hive live by sword logic. Teach them another way." —Eris Morn

name: Distant Tumulus
description: "Who will speak for us when we are gone?" —Arach Jalaal

name: Death Adder
description: You will not see me coming.

name: True Prophecy
description: "Some claim to know the future better than we do. Listen carefully. Then ask yourself: do their words ring true or false?" —Lakshmi-2

name: Dire Promise
description: "If you think this world ends well, you are mistaken." —Arach Jalaal

name: Bug-Out Bag
description: Grab and go.

name: Tempered Dynamo
description: Reinforce the bonds of legacy.

name: Royal Chase
description: "If anyone asks why you're out here, just reload." —Devrim Kay

name: Blasphemer
description: "The logic is ineluctable: Those who die deserve oblivion." —Kuldax

name: Tiebreaker
description: Overtime will be over soon.

name: Distant Tumulus
description: "Who will speak for us when we are gone?" —Arach Jalaal

name: Vertical Orbit QSm
description: Which way is up?

name: Eulogy SI4
description: We are the eulogy of a lost civilization.

name: Bad Juju
description: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." —Toland the Shattered

name: Hoosegow XE5837
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: The Defiant
description: "Do not let them distract you from your purpose!" —Lakshmi-2

name: Bad News XF4354
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: Judgment
description: "The greatest threat to a Guardian is another Guardian." —Emissary of the Nine

name: SUROS Regime
description: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

name: Honor's Edge
description: "Good leadership requires discernment: the art of finely dividing one subtle thing from another." —Executor Hideo

name: Hailing Confusion
description: "Do not face your foes head-on. Barrage them from above. Bewilder them with misdirection." —Clovis Bray

name: Xenoclast IV
description: "Nice chitin. It'd be a shame if someone broke it." —Liu Feng

name: Sturm
description: These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."

name: Sunshot
description: "Can't outrun the sunrise." —Liu Feng

name: The Hero's Burden
description: Forged in honor of Saladin, of all that has been lost and all  that remains.

name: Imperial Decree
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Basilisk
description: The miracle worker for close-range ordnance.

name: Dream Breaker
description: "Broken dreams are all I have left. Why should they be any different?" —Eris Morn

name: Toil and Trouble
description: A charm of powerful trouble.

name: Living Memory
description: "Do you ever wonder who you were, before?"

name: The Wizened Rebuke
description: Forged in honor of Skorri, of lessons learned and lessons taught.

name: Succession
description: A single word etched inside the barrel: "Sylvie-1."

name: Frostmire's Hex
description: "She loved nothing more than a good blizzard." —Lord Saladin

name: Conjecture TSc
description: What waits beyond the horizon?

name: Crooked Fang-4fr
description: I sink my teeth into my prey.

name: Proelium FR3
description: Make their victory Pyrrhic.

name: Erentil FR4
description: Bring on the sunrise.

name: Seventh Seraph Officer Revolver
description: A thing of elegance from a more civilized age.

name: Nameless Midnight
description: Strange things wake at the stroke of twelve.

name: Timelines' Vertex
description: "I give you this, to be sure that we meet again." —Lakshmi-2

name: Heretic
description: "Death is only and forever an ending. All else is sacrilege." —Kuldax

name: MIDA Mini-Tool
description: Select application: Flare gun. Water purifier. Interplanetary Positioning System. Encyclopædia Arcana. Personal flotation device. List continues.

name: Riskrunner
description: Charge your soul and let the electrons sing.

name: Dreaded Venture
description: Not to be undertaken lightly.

name: Tarrabah
description: We walk where our ancestors once walked.

name: Spare Rations
description: Whether times are lean or fat.

name: D.A.R.C.I.
description: Thank you for using the Data Analysis, Reconnaissance, and Cooperative Intelligence device. You may call me Darci.

name: Borealis
description: Light is a spectrum. Why limit yourself to a single hue?

name: False Promises
description: Gripped in the hands of the desperate many.

name: Eye of Sol
description: "The sun took my sight; thus, the sun became my eyes." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Bite of the Fox
description: "Sometimes Skorri wouldn't show herself until she was the only one left who could stand." —Lord Saladin

name: Null Calamity 9
description:
A sacred eye that speaks in lies—upending futures in its path.
The way before us to the skies shall see itself in ancient wrath.

name: Wishbringer
description: Blow out all the candles.

name: Eystein-D
description: We guarantee a fair trial.

name: Izanagi's Burden
description: "Shame. Guilt. Fear. We all bear them. Gather your regrets, purge them as best you can. Let your enemies feel the weight of your burdens." —Ada-1

name: Home for the Lost
description: "I didn't expect to like it here. But the EDZ is growing on me." —Devrim Kay

name: Anonymous Autumn
description: A lesson in the art of falling.

name: Infinite Paths 8
description:
They sowed the First, now reap the Last; forever narrows to a line
Where Light will fade into the past—when all's converted, nothing shines.

name: Maxim XI
description: "Speak briefly and precisely, and what you say will penetrate to the heart." —Executor Hideo

name: Vouchsafe
description: "We knew it would not be easy." —Paladin Hallam Fen

name: Truthteller
description: "If we wish others to accept the grim reality, we must break through every comforting illusion." —Arach Jalaal

name: Eye of Foresight
description: "To perceive the future from a great distance is both a gift and a promise of triumph." —Lakshmi-2

name: Posterity
description: A single word is etched inside the barrel: "Anastasia-1."

name: Jack Queen King 3
description:
An army meets, and stands, and falls. Three nobles wage their hopeless war.
In shifting madness, evil crawls. One stands above the battle's roar.

name: West of Sunfall 7
description:
A spark of knowledge with each fall, the purpose of the endless youth.
No longer shunned, dark's nameless call now brings about tenebrous truth.

name: Twilight Oath
description: Engraved in illuminated letters on the weapon's chassis: THE AWOKEN MADE ME.

name: A Single Clap
description: Hold your applause till the end.

name: Shepherd's Watch
description: Nobody talks about the day the Shepherd's staff became the Shepherd's rifle.

name: Show of Force
description: How far will you go?

name: Widow's Bite
description: I will outlive you.

name: Thunderlord
description: They return from fields afar. The eye has passed, the end nears. Do not fade quietly. Let thunder reign again.

name: Inaugural Address
description: My first act as emperor was to send the Consul into the wasteland. The golden sun would burn away his corrupt form—a fitting symbol for the revolution that was to be my reign.

name: A Fine Memorial
description: "Thousands of Guardians fell to Crota and the Hive. Thousands." —Eris Morn

name: Memory Interdict
description: "I have no time for nostalgia. Give me visions of braided futures, brilliantly aflame." —Lakshmi-2

name: Vestian Dynasty
description: "Long live the Queen." —Petra Venj

name: Death by Scorn
description: "The Barons fight together." —Elykris, transl. from Eliksni

name: Martyr's Make
description: Remember those who have gone before.

name: The Recluse
description: My bite will turn your sweet flesh to vile rot.

name: Wishbringer
description: Blow out all the candles.

name: Bequest
description: A single word etched on the guard: "Lusia-1."

name: Temporal Clause
description: the future narrows narrows narrows narrows

name: Right Side of Wrong
description: Where do you stand?

name: Alone as a god
description: I am the perfect loving god, and all will tremble to know me.

name: Reckless Oracle
description: "Knowing how it ends isn't the same as wanting it to be over." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

name: Positive Outlook
description: Lead by example.

name: Perfect Paradox
description:
A tale that's different from the rest: the thread unfurls against the clocks.
The one the Speaker loved the best must have a perfect paradox.

name: Subtle Calamity
description: Quiet but deadly.

name: Polaris Lance
description: "I've forgotten so much of my past life, of my family. But when I hold this rifle, everything feels right. I feel like… I'm home." —Ana Bray

name: The Chaperone
description: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday

name: Lord of Wolves
description: By this right alone do I rule.

name: Crooked Fang-4fr
description: I sink my teeth into my prey.

name: The Fool's Remedy
description: Forged in honor of Nirwen, and the righting of foolish wrongs.

name: Motion to Compel
description: "Take the long view."

name: Occluded Finality
description: Silence is better than unmeaning words.

name: Metronome-52
description: SUROS invites you to keep it steady.

name: Point of the Stag
description: Gore befalls those who do not respect the hart.

name: Song of Justice VI
description: "Justice must be true, swift, and utterly impartial." —Executor Hideo

name: Good Counsel IX
description: "Surround yourself with wise advisors." —Executor Hideo

name: Crimson
description: According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.

name: Main Ingredient
description: "Now stir the sauce…"

name: Omniscient Eye
description: "I have seen too much. No one else should bear these burdens." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

name: Duality
description: "The question becomes whether or not to fire, not where to aim." —Osiris

name: Baligant XU7743
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: The Lament
description: The last thing the Vex ever heard—the grinding wails of a vicious Banshee.

name: The Cut and Run
description: "How do you think we got here?" —Avrok, trans. from Eliksni

name: Night Watch
description: Sleep with both eyes open.

name: Lumina
description: There must be meaning in my roar.

name: Coriolis Force
description: "A single idea can be enough to alter the spin of entire systems. I've had several of them." —Clovis Bray

name: The Summoner (Adept)
description: Join the dance of fire and birth.

name: Eriana's Vow
description: A light in the dark.

name: The Marine
description: Improvise. Adapt. Overcome.

name: Randy's Throwing Knife
description: "On me, team; I'm capturing the third point!" —Randy, upon receiving orders not to

name: Fighting Lion
description: "I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." —Wei Ning

name: The Prospector
description: "Some things should stay buried."

name: Double-Edged Answer
description: Everything has a cost.

name: Crowd Pleaser
description: Give them what they came for.

name: The Old Fashioned
description: This is the way things were.

name: Legend of Acrius
description: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

name: Tractor Cannon
description: Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.

name: Deadpan Delivery
description: Emphasis on the "dead."

name: Le Monarque
description: "Wings flutter. Beauty distracts. Poison injects. The butterfly's curse extends to your enemies. A short life, shortened further by your hand." —Ada-1

name: First In, Last Out
description: "I don't know how it works. You just keep taking damage and keep firing."

name: Last Hope
description: Remember what you fight for.

name: Graviton Lance
description: Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.

name: Vigilance Wing
description: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance

name: Negative Space
description: See the art in what's subtracted.

name: Eye of Sol (Adept)
description: "The sun took my sight; thus, the sun became my eyes." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Crimil's Dagger
description: "She only wanted to help. I know that now." —Lord Saladin

name: Copperhead-4sn
description: My fangs are bared.

name: Veleda-D
description: Your victory is foreseen.

name: Elegy-49
description: SUROS invites you to bring about the end.

name: Hoosegow
description: Cause a stir.

name: Love and Death
description: "To the Hive, they are the same. Show them some love." —Eris Morn

name: Sins of the Past
description: What once was old shall be new again, and history will have its revenge.

name: Stryker's Sure-Hand
description: No job too big.

name: Sleepless
description: "I see our path ahead, full of despair and hardship, and I will walk it with joy in my heart." —Sjur Eido

name: The Militia's Birthright
description: "Earth is our home. Not Mars, not Venus, not even the Reef. We must ensure it is a place we can continue to live for many generations to come." —Devrim Kay

name: Long Shadow
description: Inhale. Exhale. Flash of light. Endless fallout.

name: Pentatonic-48
description: SUROS invites you to light it up.

name: Morrigan-D
description: Your domain is the battlefield. Its ways are your ways.

name: Dead Man Walking XX7463
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: Uriel's Gift
description: Take weapon in hand and fly to victory.

name: Solemn Hymn
description: Stand together and play the song that sounds across the stars.

name: Scathelocke
description: Our eyes squinted, our teeth clenched, our prayers answered.

name: Valakadyn
description: In dark water, my fangs are bared.

name: Black Talon
description: "His life brought peace to the Reef. His death brings a sword." —Crows of the Black Hull

name: Zenobia-D
description: You are the true power on the throne.

name: Jiangshi AR4
description: You can't outrun the dead.

name: Halfdan-D
description: Your name will ring out, your deeds will resound forever.

name: Galliard-42
description: SUROS invites you to kick up your heels.

name: Transfiguration
description: Desire becomes reality, o wishbringer mine.

name: Devil's Ruin
description: "Press on! The Devils will rue the day they came to our doors!" —Lord Shaxx

name: The Dream
description: "I dream of a world prepared to fight for its existence." —Lakshmi-2

name: Horror Story
description: It never starts out scary.

name: Blast Furnace
description: Forged in the hottest fires.

name: The Jade Rabbit
description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

name: Martyr's Retribution
description: That which returns from the void will always seek revenge.

name: A Swift Verdict
description: “Judgment is final.” —Emissary of the Nine

name: The Number
description: "Ah, but which number? Why it and no others?" —Lakshmi-2

name: Hawkmoon
description: Stalk thy prey and let loose thy talons upon the Darkness.

name: Minuet-42
description: SUROS invites you to join the dance.

name: Pribina-D
description: Adventure is in your blood.

name: Imset HC4
description: The City's foes ready themselves for the end.

name: Emperor's Courtesy
description: "A Reefborn riotgun, rewritten with Hive voices to aid Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus

name: Uriel's Gift
description: Take weapon in hand and fly to victory.

name: IKELOS_HC_v1.0.1
description:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: Night Terror
description: "Become their nightmare." —Eris Morn

name: I Am Alive
description: "When the end comes, I reserve the right to be last." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

name: Royal Dispensation II
description: "New Monarchy believes in giving generously, like rain in spring." —Executor Hideo

name: The Guiding Sight
description: Forged in honor of Efrideet, and all that inspires.

name: The Colony
description: We outnumber you. We will find you. You are alone, and we are colony.

name: Conspirator
description: Did Ghaul always dream of a republic? What terrible worm burrowed into his heart that he would betray my love and plot against me?

name: Oxygen SR3
description: Fight on. You're still breathing.

name: Man o' War
description: Do not enter my realm and expect to leave unscathed.

name: Medley-45
description: SUROS invites you to serve up your greatest hits.

name: Loud Lullaby
description: "Let their souls sing along." —Eris Morn

name: The Deicide
description: "Believe in war, and nothing else." —Lakshmi-2

name: Seventh Seraph SI-2
description: Kept in holster as the last line. Known for its reliability.

name: Motion to Suppress
description: "Present your truths carefully."

name: Mob Justice
description: Life offers few greater pleasures than to humiliate the venal aristocracy before a crowd. I am father to the people, and they shall adore me above all others.

name: Wrong Side of Right
description: The right thing, for the wrong reasons.

name: The Last Dance
description: Save it for me.

name: Thorn
description: "To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." —13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow

name: Sol Pariah 6
description:
Amid the endless death one flew—unnatural all-consuming need—
And in the space between the two, accursed comprehension freed.

name: The Conqueror 2
description:
To Tower comes a war in red; an orphan sounds the empire's call.
Mortal angels mourn the dead while lightless light wraps night in pall.

name: The Mountaintop
description: "In the heat of battle, Guardian, you will know the right choice to make." —Lord Shaxx

name: Kibou AR3
description: It springs eternal.

name: Symmetry
description: "Duality is not a curse, but a gift." —Author unknown

name: Prophet of Doom
description: "You know how this will end." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

name: Sleeper Simulant
description: Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.

name: Bonechiller
description: "It seeps under your skin; settles in your bones. Even outside of its presence, you can feel its chill." —The Exo Stranger

name: The Button
description: Jolly. Shiny. Candy-like. Push it.

name: Monte Carlo
description: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

name: Trust
description: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter

name: Persuader
description: "They say you can't reason with these enemies. I dunno—my gun and I seem to manage just fine." —Kei-Ying

name: Techeun Force
description: Sworn into faithful service to the Queen, the Techeuns of the Reef have long protected the secrets of the Awoken.

name: Pit Launcher
description: Let everyone fear the gaping maw.

name: Accrued Redemption
description: "I should never have let it come to this. Now each arrow is a penance." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

name: Divinity
description: Calibrate reality. Seek inevitability. Embody divinity.

name: Nox Veneris II
description: Night comes for us. We are not ready.

name: Elatha FR4
description: The sun shines on both joy and grief.

name: Elatha FR4
description: The sun shines on both joy and grief.

name: Mindbender's Ambition
description: "Hiraks always did like to leave an impression." —The Spider

name: The Epicurean
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Hard Light
description: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

name: Go Figure
description: Can't let the Shore get you down.

name: Heart of Time
description: "Perhaps it exists. Perhaps it does not. Either we shall find it, or we shall become it." —Lakshmi-2

name: Outrageous Fortune
description: No accounting for where it will fall.

name: Show of Force XF4865
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: Traveler's Judgment 5
description:
A visitor ignites the sky, and in the truth of light it dreams:
Above the dead and yet-to-die, a legion's blade with fire screams.

name: Trophy Hunter
description: "I serve this broken Empire no longer." —Tazaroc

name: Steel Sybil Z-14
description:
"Everything I touch falls apart! I see the fragments on the floor!"

"Well, isn't that a good thing? You know, if you're a sword?"

name: Adored
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Spider's eclectic tastes.

name: Merciless
description: Entropy is inevitable.

name: Beloved
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Does Not Compute
description: The engineers aren't ready for us.

name: Zephyr
description: In the cold of winter, we remember that the warm west wind will blow again.

name: Pribina-D
description: Adventure is in your blood.

name: Sunrise GL4
description: Do not wait for the sun to rise.

name: Exit Strategy
description: "If you don't got one, it's time to make one." —The Drifter

name: Commemoration
description: A single word is etched inside the barrel: "Clovis-II-1."

name: Steel Sybil Z-14
description:
"Everything I touch falls apart! I see the fragments on the floor!"

"Well, isn't that a good thing? You know, if you're a sword?"

name: D.F.A.
description: "Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira

name: Heritage
description: A single word etched inside the barrel: "Wilhelmina-1."

name: Skyburner's Oath
description: The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Victory or death!"

name: Multimach CCX
description: Friends are as companions on a journey who ought to aid each other to persevere.

name: The Domino
description: "Who will be the first to fall?" —Lakshmi-2

name: Every Waking Moment
description: "Even my idle thoughts are haunted." —Eris Morn

name: The Emperor's Envy
description: The son's ambition will be his undoing.

name: Crimil's Dagger
description: "She only wanted to help. I know that now." —Lord Saladin

name: The Time-Worn Spire
description: Forged in honor of Silimar, and persistence in the face of impossible odds.

name: Prometheus Lens
description: "Cryptarchs made a crystal that starts fires? Get me one. I don't care how you do it. Go!" —Cayde-6

name: Tango-45 XK5094
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: Arctic Haze
description: "A haze permeates the air here, occluding clear sight. Be very sure of your aim." —The Exo Stranger

name: Temptation's Hook
description: A finger of death from which to hang.

name: Subzero Salvo
description: "Our enemies are not subtle, so neither shall we be. Make the chasms echo with the thunder of your artillery." —Clovis Bray

name: Controlling Vision
description: "Once you see how the balance is tipped against us—once you see doom coming, inexorable and cold—then you must act." —Arach Jalaal

name: Eleventh Hour
description: "We will save and protect anyone who joins Dead Orbit. There is a place on our ships for you." —Arach Jalaal

name: Ancient Gospel
description: "These forces have existed forever, but only one of them speaks to us." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

name: Good Bone Structure
description: This one is a real looker.

name: The Fool's Remedy
description: Forged in honor of Nirwen, and the righting of foolish wrongs.

name: Avalanche
description: If they're close enough to see it start, then they'd better run.

name: Drang (Baroque)
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: The Ringing Nail
description: Strike while the iron's hot.

name: Gunnora's Axe
description: "She taught us all to appreciate a good, sturdy axe." —Lord Saladin

name: Hard Truths
description: It never gets easier.

name: Shining Sphere
description: Above the cloud with its shadow is the star with its light.

name: Curtain Call
description: It's time for the final bow.

name: Luna's Howl
description: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

name: Better Devils
description: Angels can't help you here.

name: Not Forgotten
description: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

name: Requiem-45
description: Requiem-45: SUROS invites you to honor the dead.

name: Machina Dei 4
description:
A charnel but effulgent orb—beacon in a loathsome dark—
Fêted, fetid corpses rise—a too-long-absent gibbous spark.

name: Infinite Paths 8
description:
They sowed the First, now reap the Last; forever narrows to a line
Where Light will fade into the past—when all's converted, nothing shines.

name: CALUS Mini-Tool
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: The Long Walk
description: "There is an end to everything." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Last Perdition
description: Can't outrun the ending.

name: Redrix's Claymore
description: "On the ladder and in the fight, momentum is the answer."

name: Play of the Game
description: Show no mercy.

name: Malfeasance
description: "Nothing kills a Guardian faster than another Guardian." —The Drifter

name: Premonition
description: "You walked through my dream, and in your wake, you left only death." —Eris Morn

name: Magnum Shepherd
description: Bring magnificent and glorious battle.

name: Whispering Slab
description: It sings of sorrows that have not yet come to pass.

name: Edge Transit
description: What did you trade away to secure passage to the edge?

name: Interregnum XVI
description: "Until a ruler arises, we act as simple trustees. Protecting. Receiving. Executing." —Executor Hideo

name: Impromptu-49
description: SUROS invites you to be spontaneous.

name: Warden's Law
description: Fight. Win. Li- Li- Li- Li- Li- FATAL EXCEPTION HAS OCCURRED AT 0028:C001E36

name: Main Ingredient
description: "Now stir the sauce…"

name: Frontier Justice
description: "…and after that, there will be time for questions."

name: Exile's Curse (Adept)
description: It's a blessing in disguise.

name: Hagakure
description: The way of the warrior is death.

name: Negative Space
description: See the art in what's subtracted.

name: Complex Solution
description: A quantum algorithm, like a sword stroke, must be repeated until the solution is certain.

name: Unspoken Promise
description: The promise is in the point of the blade.

name: The Vision
description: Glory in the damage the right blast can do.

name: Outlast
description: No such word as extinction.

name: Terran Wind
description: "The Great Machine isn't killing us. We're killing ourselves over the Great Machine." —Brivi, transl. from Eliksni

name: Through Fire and Flood
description: The passage to the Shore is not an easy road.

name: Roar of the Bear
description: "Silimar's defense broke more assaults than not. His retribution would shake the ground." —Lord Saladin

name: Bushwhacker
description: They'll never see you coming.

name: Breakneck
description: "They don't make Dark Age tech like this anymore. Lucky for you I kept all mine." —The Drifter

name: Darkest Before
description: "Persevere, or die in darkness. The choice is yours." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Waking Vigil
description: "We have a duty to this solar system that goes deeper than blood, deeper than oaths." —Paladin Devi Cassl

name: Nightshade
description: Three drops is all it takes.

name: Nergal PR4
description: Take arms against the lions of death, the kings of sunset.

name: Cadenza-43
description: SUROS invites you to improvise.

name: Retold Tale
description: "It's what gets left out, what gets reemphasized that you have to pay attention to." —Esila, daughter of Sila

name: Ace of Spades
description: "Folding was never an option." —Cayde-6

name: Salvation's Grip
description: "I respect what I cannot steal from and you cannot take from the dark." —Excerpt from an old Eliksni salvage manifest

name: Outbreak Perfected
description: ~directive = KILL while enemies = PRESENT: execute(directive)~

name: Berenger's Memory
description: Take your place among the company of heroes.

name: True Prophecy
description: "Some claim to know the future better than we do. Listen carefully. Then ask yourself: do their words ring true or false?" —Lakshmi-2

name: Jack Queen King 3
description:
An army meets, and stands, and falls. Three nobles wage their hopeless war.
In shifting madness, evil crawls. One stands above the battle's roar.

name: Jötunn
description: "Untamed. Destructive. As forceful and chaotic as Ymir himself." —Ada-1

name: Hoosegow
description: Cause a stir.

name: Mos Epoch III
description: The perpetual eventually gives way to the variable.

name: Blue Shift
description: What is the color of the universe?

name: The Spiteful Fang
description: Pierce the heart of reality.

name: Shining Sphere
description: Above the cloud with its shadow is the star with its light.

name: Nature of the Beast
description: Don't let them change you.

name: Garden Progeny 1
description:
Two siblings cleaved by time and space, reflections never found alone,
The ending of the eldritch race—a path long seen but never known.

name: Guiding Star
description: "We will make a new home out among the stars, and then we will know peace. Until that day..." —Arach Jalaal

name: First In, Last Out
description: "I don't know how it works. You just keep taking damage and keep firing."

name: Beidenhander
description: Let the song of the monarch be heard!

name: Black Scorpion-4sr
description: I attack from the shadows. I never miss.

name: BrayTech Werewolf
description: The right weapon can transform you.

name: Astral Horizon (Adept)
description: Even the brightest stars eventually set.

name: Telemachus-C
description: The long wait is over.

name: Resonance-42
description: SUROS invites you to strike a chord.

name: Antiope-D
description: They look to you to save them.

name: Phosphorus MG4
description: The star in the east, the fire in the dawn.

name: Chattering Bone
description: We have so much to discuss, o seeker mine.

name: Throne-Cleaver
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Death's Razor
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Goldtusk
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Wendigo GL3
description: Turn your hunger outward, never inward.

name: Loaded Question
description: Hey. You see Cayde around, tell him his gun's ready. —Banshee-44

name: Dire Promise
description: "If you think this world ends well, you are mistaken." —Arach Jalaal

name: Age-Old Bond
description: Symbiosis. Not predation. Never predation, o wary one mine.

name: Hammerhead
description: Smash through the veil.

name: Hollow Words
description: Holes for the whole.

name: Falling Guillotine
description: What won't be given must be taken.

name: Proelium FR3
description: Make their victory Pyrrhic.

name: Jorum's Claw
description: "He was more wolf than Human, we used to say." —Lord Saladin

name: Jian 7 Rifle
description: Come, brothers and sisters! Let us make way for the new ruler!

name: Dust Rock Blues
description: "No job too tough, if the price is good." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

name: Tigerspite
description: "What else can we do but take up arms?" —Corsair Amrita Vae

name: Nation of Beasts
description: I can show you how we were in our prime. You need only ask, o student mine.

name: Revoker
description: When they have your back to the wall, when all seems lost—steel yourself! Command your future!

name: Exile's Curse
description: It's a blessing in disguise.

name: The Supremacy
description: "He didn't recognize me, at the end." —Jolyon Till the Rachis

name: The Frigid Jackal
description: An ice-cold creature of opportunity.

name: Finite Impactor
description: Do not say a little in many words—say a great deal in a few.

name: Restoration VIII
description: "We need proper tools if we are to rebuild." —Executor Hideo

name: Just in Case
description: Even contingencies need contingencies.

name: BrayTech RWP Mk. II
description:
"Stress feedback tests proved successful. We have a solid production-line model on our hands."
—A. Bray

name: No Turning Back
description: Some paths can't be untread.

name: Arsenic Bite-4b
description: My aim is true.

name: Hawthorne's Field-Forged Shotgun
description: "What am I supposed to put here? 'It's a gun. Kill bad guys with it.'" —Suraya Hawthorne

name: Good Bone Structure
description: This one is a real looker.

name: Baligant
description: Defend that which is precious to you.

name: Doomsday
description: The age-old chant: The end of days draws nigh.

name: Last Man Standing
description: Call me Ozymandias.

name: Seventh Seraph VY-7
description: No offense is too small to reprimand.

name: Tommy's Matchbook
description: "It's warm in here."

name: Nightshade
description: Three drops is all it takes.

name: Buzzard
description: Circle 'round, great harbinger of death.

name: Peace by Consensus
description: "The Consensus is bigger than the Speaker. Bigger than any of us. It will survive, because it has to." —Commander Zavala, acting head of the Consensus

name: The Day's Fury
description: Forged in honor of Radegast, and righteous rage born anew.

name: Wish-Ender
description: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

name: Trinity Ghoul
description: "I couldn't afford to miss. Not when it was his life on the line." —Marin Mansanas, Tangled Outrider

name: Spoiler Alert
description: Someone is going to die.

name: Misfit
description: Nowhere else to go.

name: Gnawing Hunger
description: Don't let pride keep you from a good meal.

name: Service Revolver
description: To Serve and Protect.

name: Python
description: "If they let you get that close, they deserve it." —The Drifter

name: Edgewise
description: Don't let them get a word in.

name: IKELOS_SR_v1.0.1
description:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: Acantha-D
description: Your piercing Light knows no limits; your searcher's heart, no bounds.

name: Anniella
description: Slender and deadly.

name: Tango-45
description: SUROS invites you to be passionate.

name: Manannan SR4
description: Escort your foes to their defeat.

name: Black Scorpion-4sr
description: I attack from the shadows. I never miss.

name: The Wizened Rebuke
description: Forged in honor of Skorri, of lessons learned and lessons taught.

name: Line in the Sand
description: No farther.

name: Tomorrow's Answer
description: Could you please repeat the question?

name: Last Perdition
description: Can't outrun the ending.

name: Deafening Whisper
description: "The right message is loud at any volume." —Osiris

name: Allied Demand
description: Rest satisfied with doing well, and leave others to talk of you as they please.

name: Silicon Neuroma
description: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir

name: Bad Omens
description: "Can't avoid 'em. Trick is surviving 'em." —The Drifter

name: Timelines' Vertex
description: "I give you this, to be sure that we meet again." —Lakshmi-2

name: One Small Step
description: "Humanity once dreamt of walking on the Moon. Such innocence." —Eris Morn

name: It Stared Back
description: At the edge of the universe, I stared into the infinite deep. It stared back, and was pleased. I would become the herald of its victory, and bear witness for all creation.

name: Motion to Vacate
description: "Done cannot be undone."

name: Glacioclasm
description: Clear and cold, forever.

name: Better Devils
description: Angels can't help you here.

name: Horror's Least
description: "Some things should not be saved." —Techeun Sedia

name: Swift Solstice
description: Time is running short.

name: IKELOS_SG_v1.0.2
description:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: The Doubt
description: "Do not fear your doubts. Fight your doubts. Honor them as you would honor your enemies." —Lakshmi-2

name: Sole Survivor
description: Names mean nothing to the dead.

name: Midnight Coup
description: The conspirators were too afraid to kill me—rightly so. I am the beloved father of the people, and the glorious mob would not suffer my death. My sentence was exile.

name: Foregone Conclusion
description: This ending was inevitable.

name: Vacuna SR4
description: A toast to our love for danger. Fear makes victory ever sweeter.

name: Redrix's Broadsword
description: The second swing is no less deadly.

name: Jian 7 Rifle
description: Come, brothers and sisters! Let us make way for the new ruler!

name: Adhortative
description: "So... you think you can kill a god?" —Ghost

name: Agrona PR4
description: Do not be afraid. Our fate cannot be taken from us. It is a gift.

name: Battle Scar
description: "Do not concern yourself with how many horns I bear." —Lord Shaxx

name: Thin Line
description: Sometimes you forget which side you're on.

name: Felwinter's Lie
description: "I just like the name. Doesn't mean anything." —Lord Felwinter to Lord Timur

name: Quickfang
description: My smile is full of blades.

name: Eternity's Edge
description: "A sword is a wand that casts two spells: parry and cut." —Tarsem Sauer

name: Crown-Splitter
description: "Our enemies think themselves gods and kings. Show them the error of their ways." —Callisto Yin

name: Relentless
description: "Embrace your fate." —Emissary of the Nine

name: The Steady Hand
description: Forged in honor of Perun, and a just and unwavering resolve.

name: High Albedo
description: "Don't let the Light blind you to what's right before your eyes."  —The Exo Stranger

name: The Showrunner
description: Once you have one, you'll wonder how you ever did without.

name: IKELOS_HC_v1.0.2
description:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: Truth
description: "…is where you seek it." —Lomar

name: Cold Denial
description: A familiar tool in the face of failure.

name: Steelfeather Repeater
description: There is strength in delicate things.

name: IKELOS_SR_v1.0.2
description:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: Widow's Bite
description: I will outlive you.

name: Gravity Slingshot
description: "On the day our ships are ready, the City will see us blast into the sky." —Arach Jalaal

name: Claws of the Wolf
description: "Perun's strikes would hit so fast and true that our enemies wouldn't realize their fate until it was too late." —Lord Saladin

name: Gahlran's Right Hand
description: "A Reefborn autorifle, rewritten with Hive voices to defend Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus

name: Pyroclastic Flow
description: There is no minimum safe distance.

name: Breachlight
description: It has been melted and reforged many times.

name: Eystein-D
description: We guarantee a fair trial.

name: Retrofuturist
description: They were so optimistic about us.

name: Badlander
description: "We are a long way from home." —Arrha (trans. from Eliksni)

name: Perseverance
description: It was a long time coming. But it wasn't the wait. It was the journey.

name: MIDA Multi-Tool
description: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.

name: Stochastic Variable
description: "However certain we are of our simulations, they always contain an element of unpredictability." —Lakshmi-2

name: Pleiades Corrector
description: "No, I don't think I'll tell you what it's for. That would be too easy." —Lakshmi-2

name: Sweet Business
description: "…I love my job."

name: Coldheart
description: The latest Omolon engineering leverages liquid fuel as coolant to keep weapon systems at biting subzero temperatures.

name: Niflheim Frost
description: The chill you feel is death.

name: Daedalus Code
description: Make your own escape.

name: Breath of the Dragon
description: "Once Timur saw you, it was already over, whether they knew it or not." —Lord Saladin

name: Ruinous Effigy
description: From the many wings of ruin blows a wind that will reshape this dead world.

name: The Last Word
description: "Yours, until the last flame dies and all words have been spoken." —Shin Malphur to you, as you journey forth into the unknown

name: Tomorrow's Answer (Adept)
description: Could you please repeat the question?

name: Orimund's Anvil
description: "He was the first to forge arms for the Iron Banner." —Lord Saladin

name: Swift Ride XE8375
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: Broadsword Launcher
description: Let our monarch's spirit ring out and roar!

name: Trustee
description: A single word is etched inside the barrel: "Alton-1."

name: Xenophage
description: This might sting a little.

name: Agamid
description: The lumbering beast stands ready to fight.

name: Zenobia-D
description: You are the true power on the throne.

name: Interference VI
description: Come between your enemies and their lives.

name: Tatara Gaze
description: The fire in your eyes reveals all truths.

name: Duty Bound
description: "Due respect, Commander? I was there when the Hive found us on Earth. I was there when we stopped them on Titan. And I'll be there when we wipe them out." —Sloane

name: Escape Velocity
description: "The first step toward truth is to let go of all that we know and hold dear." —Arach Jalaal

name: Courageous Surrender
description: Do not go softly.

name: Future Safe 10
description:
See who's robed as if a god, who stands with pride above the rest!
Destroy this ancient nameless fraud! Destroy the one whose death was blessed!

name: Bane of Sorrow
description: "A Reefborn heavy implement, rewritten with Hive voices to make way for Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus

name: The Last Breath
description: "All things end." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Cold Front
description: Sweep in like a force of nature. Leave destruction in your wake.

name: The Wardcliff Coil
description: Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.

name: Swift Ride
description: It'll be over before you know it.

name: Disrespectful Stare
description: Don't you look at me that way!

name: Lincoln Green
description: The survivors of that day chose not to remember.

name: Agenda 5
description: Fifth time's a charm.

name: Friction Fire
description: Speed, heat, and Light. Fire away.

name: Halfdan-D
description: Your name will ring out, your deeds will resound forever.

name: Valakadyn
description: In dark water, my fangs are bared.

name: Eternal Slumber
description: "The night sky closes in. We should not be here when the final star fades." —Arach Jalaal

name: Mos Epoch III
description: The perpetual eventually gives way to the variable.

name: Adverse Possession IX
description: Open and hostile and ready.

name: Athelflad-D
description: Make yourself dreadful to your enemies and indispensable to your allies.

name: Etana SI4
description: The reign of Light will be long and peaceful.

name: Urchin-3si
description: I will draw them in, then take them out.

name: Cerberus+1
description: "Because three heads are good, but four are better." —Jeza "Jeopardy" Verlayn

name: Seventh Seraph Carbine
description: The old workhorse, still with many years to give.

name: Hush
description: "Breathe. Line up the shot. Enjoy the quiet before the kill." —The Drifter

name: Three Graves
description: "No need to dig too deep. Our slumber will not be disturbed." —Arach Jalaal

name: Radiant Stardust
description: "We are but dust on a stellar wind." —Arach Jalaal

name: No Time to Explain
description: A single word etched onto the inside of the weapon's casing: Now.

name: 21% Delirium
description: "All right." —A Dark Age drifter

name: Biting Winds
description: "The Fallen describe Darkness as a gale. A force of nature, arising suddenly, from seemingly nowhere." —The Exo Stranger

name: The Guiding Sight
description: Forged in honor of Efrideet, and all that inspires.

name: Fixed Odds
description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Abide the Return
description: "It is what she asks of us." —Paladin Kamala Rior

name: Origin Story
description: Your inciting incident is their tragic ending.

name: Tranquility
description: "They think violence will bring peace. Maybe it can." —Eris Morn

name: Timecard
description: Clock in for work.

name: Loquitor IV
description: The rifle speaks for itself.

name: Threat Level
description: Hold on 'til midnight.

name: The Fourth Horseman
description: It's not a holdout weapon; it's a pathfinder.

name: Autumn Wind
description:
"I am the autumnal sun,
With autumn gales my race is run."

name: Fate Cries Foul
description: So make your own.

name: The Forward Path
description: Forged in honor of Weyloran, and roads yet traveled.

name: Astral Horizon
description: Even the brightest stars eventually set.

name: Gallant Charge
description: There is a brief moment, before the clash, that lives between fear and certainty. Push through.

name: The Old Fashioned
description: This is the way things were.

name: The Permanent Truth
description: Always do what is right.

name: Enigma's Draw
description: "Indeed, I traffic in all kinds of secrets and mysteries. Weapons, as well." —Lakshmi-2

name: IKELOS_SMG_v1.0.1
description:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: Legend of Acrius
description: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

name: BrayTech Winter Wolf
description: The leader of the pack endures through the harshest conditions.

name: Acantha-D XK8434
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: Legal Action II
description: It's time to file a complaint.

name: Thermal Erosion
description: "Europa has relit the fire in my soul; one that even its freezing winds cannot chill."  —Clovis Bray

name: Critical Sass
description: A chain reaction of nuclear insolence.

name: Galliard-42 XN7568
description: A Black Armory experimental prototype.

name: Escape Velocity
description: "The first step toward truth is to let go of all that we know and hold dear." —Arach Jalaal

name: Hazard of the Cast
description: "Nothing for it once you place your life upon the die." —The Drifter

name: 18 Kelvins
description: Cold-blooded.

name: Hawthorne's Field-Forged Shotgun
description: "What am I supposed to put here? 'It's a gun. Kill bad guys with it.'" —Suraya Hawthorne

name: Dead-Ender
description: "I question the wisdom of our current trajectory." —Arach Jalaal

name: Seventh Seraph CQC-12
description: Word into law, held at gunpoint.

name: The End
description: "Show them that safe harbor is very far away." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Nature of the Beast
description: Don't let them change you.

name: Ether Doctor
description: "Control the supply." —The Spider

name: Hollow Earth
description: "Do we need another reminder? This world is but a grave." —Arach Jalaal

name: Translation Theory
description: "Must consider new ways… What cannot change, dies…" —Variks, the Loyal

name: Smuggler's Word
description: A deal is a deal. Or so you hope.

name: Wavesplitter
description: Omolon's newest breakthrough uses focused sonic waves to superheat electrons into a devastating energy beam.

name: Traveler's Chosen
description: "All we have left now is our faith."

name: Worldline Zero
description: A single strike can alter the course of history.

name: The Hero's Burden
description: Forged in honor of Saladin, of all that has been lost and all  that remains.

name: Orewing's Maul
description: "They were the first to chart the Cosmodrome's mountains." —Lord Saladin

name: Elegy-49
description: SUROS invites you to bring about the end.

name: A Sudden Death
description: "Everything dies. This is proof." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Seven-Six-Five
description: There's a rhythm to it.

name: Call to Serve
description: "We have to do more than ask for help, Suraya. We have to give them something to believe in."

name: Tone Patrol
description: We are listening and watching.

name: IKELOS_SG_v1.0.1
description:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: Whisper of the Worm
description: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the host… teeth sharper than your own.

name: The Summoner
description: Join the dance of fire and birth.

name: Prosecutor
description: "All this in service of one purpose. You have their attention. Let us see if you can keep it." —Emissary of the Nine

name: The Rattler
description: You'll never hear me coming.

name: Minimum Distance
description: All I need is a little breathing room.

name: Dead Man Walking
description: Before you? I just remember searching. What do you remember from before me?

name: Last Hope
description: Remember what you fight for.

name: Eternal Blazon
description: "But this eternal blazon must not be to ears of flesh and blood."

name: BrayTech Osprey
description: Expected Use Timeframe: UNKNOWN.

name: No Feelings
description: Lose yourself in the moment.

name: Archimedes Truth
description: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.

name: Dark Decider
description: The oldest, shortest words—yes and no—are those which require the most thought.

name: Truthteller
description: "If we wish others to accept the grim reality, we must break through every comforting illusion." —Arach Jalaal

name: Pluperfect
description: builds builds builds builds the past

name: Nameless Midnight
description: Strange things wake at the stroke of twelve.

name: Swarm of the Raven
description: "With enough altitude, Felwinter's destruction would blanket the field farther than you could see." —Lord Saladin

name: Talons of the Eagle
description: "She soared above the battle and dove in the blink of an eye. If they were still alive, they were the unlucky ones." —Lord Saladin

name: Flash and Thunder
description: Show them the Light.

name: Orthrus
description: Let slip the dogs of war.

name: Berenger's Memory
description: Take your place among the company of heroes.

name: Unification VII
description: "To persuade others, we must show that we act in their interests." —Executor Hideo

name: The Vow
description: "'Til death do us part." —Lord Shaxx

name: The Last Dance
description: Save it for me.

name: The Forward Path
description: Forged in honor of Weyloran, and roads yet traveled.

name: Distant Relation
description: "I like to keep my enemies where they can't reach me. I can always find a way to get to them if I have to." —The Drifter

name: The Queenbreaker
description: Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.

name: Stars in Shadow
description: Little is known about the early days of the Collapse. Signals vanished upon the arrival of the Darkness.

name: One Thousand Voices
description: I can be anyone you wish, o murderer mine.

name: A Cold Sweat
description: "When the dreams begin, it is already too late." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Last of the Legion
description:
“Vex technology on Mercury. Energy on Mars. This system is rich in spoils if one knows where to look.” 
—Val Ca'uor

name: Heir Apparent
description: "The Red Legion will march again." —Caiatl

name: Traveler's Judgment 5
description:
A visitor ignites the sky, and in the truth of light it dreams:
Above the dead and yet-to-die, a legion's blade with fire screams.

name: Adjudicator
description: "Hesitation kills." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Bad Reputation
description: "Here we can start over." —Mithrax, trans. from Eliksni

name: Orewing's Maul
description: "They were the first to chart the Cosmodrome's mountains." —Lord Saladin

name: Duke Mk. 44
description: Slow to shoot, but brutal upon impact.

name: Ten Paces
description: Better be quick.

name: Arbalest
description: "We didn't have linear fusions in the Dark Age. But we made it work." —The Drifter

name: Optative
description: If only you could see yourself. But you have no eyes. Not the dimmest sense survives…

name: Bad News
description: Sit down. We need to talk.

name: Shattered Peace
description: Only you can make it whole again.

name: Annual Skate
description: "When the lake used to freeze, people would dance on the ice wearing boots with tiny swords. And fall in love."
